author: covener
msg: propose trailers fix, didn't make the cut for 2.4.10 because I had backpor troubles.

author: covener
msg: core: HTTP trailers could be used to replace HTTP headers
late during request processing, potentially undoing or
otherwise confusing modules that examined or modified
request headers earlier.  Adds "MergeTrailers" directive to restore
Submitted By: Edward Lu, Yann Ylavic, Joe Orton, Eric Covener
